page.title: 06HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Mrs.Fitch has lived in Yeovil all her life,"Yeovil has changed a lot"she said.From what she said,the town centre has changed most,where the new round_abouts are in town there used to be shops and where the{Dual {Carriageway}is there used to be a park and the old{Maternity Unit. She attended the old Westfield School and could remember some teachers who still teach there. When asked about the Housing Development in the area where,she lives,Mrs.Fitch said,"I don't mind, people have to have somewhere to live." Mrs.Fitch has had a number of jobs in cleaning and before those she worked in a shoe and gloving works which has since moved from the area.At the moment she is a housewife,looking after her two children and husband.
